quote.name: quote
text: an interactive command, first half prompts for the
quote speaker (an @mention) and the second half prompts for the game or
the second part will prompt you for the speaker's full quote. note:
there is a 60 second timeout on the second part, and there is no prefix required.

ip.name: ip
text: returns the current ip address of the minecraft server, and eventually

patch.name: patch
text: returns the latest changes to a hero in dota from the latest balance patch.
using ``patch <hero>`` alone will return the changes from the latest patch,
while using ``patch <version> <hero>`` will return the changes from that spec
ific patch (currently only down to version 7.00).
